allTxts.depositWithdrawNotAllowed: The operation cannot be performed due to lack of KYC. Please contact support.
allTxts.depositTextAssetType: Please do not deposit any other digital asset except {{asset}} to the above address
allTxts.withdrawFeeDynamicText: FEE Dynamic means that the transaction cost depends on the network congestion, it can be higher or lower depending on the moments, time of day, the transaction's structure or complexity, and other factors, and not on CFX. We always apply the minimum +0.1% (one per thousand) per transaction.
allTxts.confirmFeeText1: A fee will be applied to this transaction is
allTxts.stakingText: In order to stake ZeroOne, you only need to have tokens on deposit in your wallet. Staking takes place automatically in your wallet. ZeroOne staking is exclusive to ATS by following the appropriate procedure on the website.
allTxts.plusText:
PLUS ON STAKED ZEROONE
The ZEROONE PLUS of the current month are displayed from the first day of staking.
They are updated daily.
allTxts.accountPageLogoutConfirmationText1: Do you confirm that you want to log out of your account?
allTxts.addressFormLabelPlaceholder: Assign a label to your wallet
allTxts.addressFormMessage: Please verify that the address corresponds to the specific token blockchain before saving.
allTxts.quickBuyText4: A network fee and an additional fee of 0.10% is applied on quick buy transactions
allTxts.quickBuyNotAllowed: You are not authorised to purchase the ZEROONE product. Click on the link to fill in the ZEROONE application: <atsLink>https://gestionale.atssharing.online/index.php?m=products&v=list</atsLink>
allTxts.stakingSimulSubtitle: INSERT THE AMOUNT OF ZEROONE AND THE NUMBER OF MONTHS YOU WANT TO STAKE THEM
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesText1: BASED ON THE MINIMUM ACCEPTED AMOUNT OF 1000 ZONES
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesText2: The calculator projects in the desired time the capital increased by the stake relative to the amount entered.
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesText3: Calculate how much staking can return to you by depositing your funds on the stable ZEROONE token.
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesText4: This can't vary in price but only increase for the accumulated staking.
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesText5: In the window you see the amount of the same in relation to the amount deposited.
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesTest6: There is no time constraint, you can cancel it whenever you want and in 24 hours you receive your ZEROONE and cumulative staking back in euros.
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesText7: ZEROONE is a token that does not vary from its nominal price of 1â‚¬ ea.
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesText8: The token offers a PLUS in staking of 1% monthly on the deposited funds, with no time constraints on maintenance.
allTxts.stakingSimulRulesText9: The token is liquidated in 24 hours from the order and its countervalue in the wallet of its owner.
allTxts.txtShowStaking: The ZEROONE PLUS of the current month are displayed starting from first day of staking.
allTxts.txtShowStaking1: PLUS ON THE AMOUNT OF ZEROONE STAKING.
allTxts.GurdaScreen1: SEE HOW MANY ZEROONES YOU CAN EARN.
allTxts.GurdaScreen2: ENTER THE AMOUNT OF ZEROONES AND THE TIME YOU WANT TO BLOCK THEM.
allTxts.depositNewTxt: Deposits less than the minimum amount of 60 USD will not be credited or refunded.
allTxts.widhtrawNewTxt: Withdrawals less than the minimum amount of 60 USD will not be processed.
allTxts.redTxt: The transaction cannot be performed due to lack of KYC. Contact support.
